name: Submarine Madness
description:
A fun endless runner game with your submarine. explore the wide open ocean for coins. But be careful, Mines and other dangers are out there as well. Earn coins and spend them in the shop for boosts and new submarines.

System Requirements:

  • OS: Windows xp / 10.5.6 / Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel 1.4GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Hard Drive: 50 MB available space
